sentences.english: Build a rope ladder out of your hair and climb down.
sentences.chinese: 用自己的头发做成绳梯并顺着它慢慢爬下去。

sentences.english: You must rig Jacob's ladder on starboard side.
sentences.chinese: 你船须将绳梯装在右舷侧。

sentences.english: Please fix up the rope ladders.
They finished rattling down and went ashore.
sentences.chinese: 他们扎完了绳梯的横索就上岸了。

sentences.english: "This is the rope ladder, " replied the nurse sadly.
sentences.chinese: “这是绳梯，”奶妈悲伤地回答道。

sentences.english: Annie and Jack started up the rope ladder .
sentences.chinese: 安妮和杰克抓住绳梯，开始向上爬。

sentences.english: A helicopter came along and lowered a ladder for him.
sentences.chinese: 来了一架直升机，降下来一排绳梯。

sentences.english: We climbed rather perilously down a rope- ladder to the boat below.
sentences.chinese: 我们冒着相当大的危险沿着绳梯爬到了下面的船上。

sentences.english: He fell off the rope ladder and was hurt badly.
sentences.chinese: 他从绳梯上掉下来，受了重伤。

definition: rope tackle hanging from a mast/crow foot (system of ropes through tackle to hold up an awning)
gangway/ramp (to board a ship or plane)
iron hook at the end a long pole
